ComicInfo.Title: Lost Hearts and Found Souls
ComicInfo.Summary: Mortimer Absinthe and the Iron Monk enact a murderous plan to "sanctify" London's rebellious Underdwellers, along with their newest recruit: Cole Blaquesmith! But Cole's got his hands full even without the revolution. As he and Faust square off for the first time, Cole learns of Faust's connection to Vicki. Plus, more pieces of Blaquesmith's fragmented memory come together, and he doesn't like what he's starting to remember!
